mapper.select:
SELECT user_name AS userName, user_id AS userId, user_login_name AS userLoginName, mobile, email, sex, is_admin AS isAdmin, ( CasE is_enable WHEN '0' THEN '启用' WHEN '1' THEN '禁用' END ) AS state,
organization_id AS organizationId, create_user AS createUser, create_time AS createTime, update_user AS updateUser, update_time AS updateTime FROM t_ucenter_ms_user
AND user_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userName}, '%')
ORDER BY user_id DESC
LIMIT ${start} OFFSET ${end}

SELECT m.menu_name AS menuName, m.menu_id AS menuId, m.is_show AS isShow, s.server_url AS serverUrl, CONCAT(s.server_url,m.menu_url) AS menuUrl, m.father_menu_id AS fatherMenuId FROM t_sett_ms_menu m LEFT JOIN t_sett_ms_menu_permission b ON b.menu_id = m.menu_id LEFT JOIN t_ucenter_ms_role_permission rt ON rt.permission_id = b.permission_id LEFT JOIN t_ucenter_ms_role_user_rela ru ON rt.role_id = ru.role_id LEFT JOIN t_ucenter_ms_user u ON u.user_id= ru.user_id WHERE m.is_enable = 1 and m.is_enable = b.is_enable
AND u.user_id = #{userId}
AND m.menu_type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{menuType},'%')
ORDER BY m.father_menu_id,m.order_index

SELECT menu_id AS menuId, menu_name AS menuName, father_menu_id AS fatherMenuId, menu_url AS menuUrl, menu_type AS menuType, is_enable AS isEnable, icon, order_index AS orderIndex, namespace, is_show AS isShow, system_id AS systemId FROM t_sett_ms_menu m
AND (m.menu_type=#{menuType} OR m.menu_type=2)
AND system_id IN(${systemIds})
AND m.is_enable=1 AND m.is_delete = 0
ORDER BY father_menu_id,order_index
SELECT DISTINCT (m.menu_id) AS menuId FROM t_sett_ms_menu m

SELECT distinct (m.menu_id) AS menuId FROM t_sett_ms_menu m LEFT JOIN t_sett_ms_menu_permission b ON b.menu_id = m.menu_id LEFT JOIN t_ucenter_ms_role_permission rt ON rt.permission_id = b.permission_id LEFT JOIN t_ucenter_ms_role_user_rela ru ON rt.role_id = ru.role_id LEFT JOIN t_ucenter_ms_user u ON u.user_id = ru.user_id LEFT JOIN t_ucenter_ms_role r ON ru.role_id = r.role_id WHERE m.is_enable = 1 AND r.is_delete = 0 AND m.is_enable = b.is_enable AND u.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT m.menu_name AS menuName, m.menu_id AS menuId, m.icon AS icon, menu_url AS menuUrl, m.father_menu_id AS fatherMenuId FROM t_sett_ms_menu m WHERE m.father_menu_id!=-1
AND m.menu_type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{menuType},'%')
AND m.menu_id IN ( SELECT model_key AS modelKey FROM t_admin_app_menu_item WHERE app_id IN ( SELECT app_id AS appId FROM t_admin_app_group_rela WHERE group_id = (
) AND m.is_enable = 1 ORDER BY m.father_menu_id,m.order_index
mapper.sql: SELECT group_id FROM t_admin_group WHERE group_code = #{groupCode}) AND state = 0 UNION SELECT app_id AS appId FROM t_app_apply WHERE manager_code = #{managerCode} AND apply_state = 3) AND model_type = 0
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT m.menu_name AS menuName, m.menu_id AS menuId, CONCAT(m.namespace, ':', b.permission_code) AS namespace, m.menu_url AS menuUrl, m.father_menu_id AS fatherMenuId FROM t_sett_ms_menu m LEFT JOIN t_sett_ms_menu_permission b ON b.menu_id = m.menu_id LEFT JOIN t_ucenter_ms_role_permission rt ON rt.permission_id = b.permission_id LEFT JOIN t_ucenter_ms_role_user_rela ru ON rt.role_id = ru.role_id LEFT JOIN t_ucenter_ms_user u ON u.user_id = ru.user_id
WHERE m.namespace IS NOT NULL AND m.namespace != ''
and (u.user_login_name = #{userLoginName} or u.mobile = #{userLoginName} or u.email = #{userLoginName})
and u.user_id = #{userId}
AND m.is_enable = b.is_enable AND m.is_enable = 1 ORDER BY m.father_menu_id, m.order_index) me WHERE me.namespace IS NOT NULL

SELECT user_name AS userName, user_id AS userId, user_login_name AS userLoginName, mobile, email, is_admin AS isAdmin, (CasE is_enable WHEN '0' THEN '启用' WHEN '1' THEN '禁用' END) AS state, organization_id AS organizationId FROM t_ucenter_ms_user WHERE (user_login_name = #{userLoginName} or mobile = #{userLoginName} or email = #{userLoginName}) AND is_enable = 1

SELECT m.menu_name AS menuName, m.menu_id as menuId, CONCAT(m.namespace,':',b.permission_code) AS namespace, menu_url AS menuUrl, m.father_menu_id AS fatherMenuId FROM t_sett_ms_menu m LEFT JOIN t_sett_ms_menu_permission b ON b.menu_id = m.menu_id WHERE m.is_enable=b.is_enable AND m.is_enable=1 AND b.permission_id In
#{item}
AND m.menu_type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{menuType},'%')
ORDER BY m.father_menu_id,m.order_index
SELECT r.role_id AS "roleId", r.role_name AS "roleName" FROM t_ucenter_ms_role r LEFT JOIN t_ucenter_ms_role_user_rela ru ON r.role_id = ru.role_id WHERE ru.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT m.menu_name AS menuName, m.menu_id AS menuId, menu_url AS menuUrl, namespace, menu_type AS menuType, icon, is_attention AS isAttention, m.father_menu_id AS fatherMenuId FROM t_sett_ms_menu m WHERE m.menu_id in
#{item}
AND m.menu_type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{menuType},'%')
ORDER BY m.father_menu_id,m.order_index

SELECT b.permission_name AS buttonName, b.permission_id AS buttonId, b.permission_code AS permissionCode, b.permission_type AS buttonType, (CASE b.is_enable WHEN '0' THEN '启用' WHEN '1' THEN '禁用' end) AS state FROM t_sett_ms_menu_permission b LEFT JOIN t_ucenter_ms_role_permission rb ON rb.permission_id = b.permission_id LEFT JOIN t_ucenter_ms_role_user_rela ru ON ru.role_id = rb.role_id WHERE ru.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT permission_id AS buttonId, permission_name AS buttonName, permission_code , permission_type AS buttonType, menu_id AS menuId, is_enable AS isEnable FROM t_sett_ms_menu_permission where permission_id In
#{item}

SELECT m.menu_name AS menuName, m.menu_id AS menuId, CONCAT(m.namespace,':',b.permission_code ) AS namespace, menu_url AS menuUrl, m.father_menu_id AS fatherMenuId FROM t_sett_ms_menu m LEFT JOIN t_sett_ms_menu_permission b ON b.menu_id = m.menu_id
where m.menu_type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{menuType},'%')
ORDER BY m.father_menu_id,m.order_index

SELECT m.menu_name AS menuName, m.menu_id as menuId, CONCAT(m.namespace,':',b.permission_code) AS namespace, menu_url AS menuUrl, m.father_menu_id AS fatherMenuId FROM t_sett_ms_menu m LEFT JOIN t_sett_ms_menu_permission b ON b.menu_id = m.menu_id WHERE b.permission_id IN
#{item}
AND m.menu_type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{menuType},'%')
ORDER BY m.father_menu_id,m.order_index

SELECT CASE WHEN b.permission_type = 5 THEN CONCAT('el_',b.permission_id) WHEN b.permission_type = 1 THEN CONCAT('r_',b.menu_id) WHEN b.permission_type = 2 THEN CONCAT('w_',b.menu_id) WHEN b.permission_type = 3 THEN CONCAT('e_',b.menu_id) WHEN b.permission_type = 4 THEN CONCAT('d_',b.menu_id) END AS boxId FROM t_sett_ms_menu_permission b WHERE b.permission_id IN
#{item}

SELECT m.menu_name AS menuName, m.menu_id AS menuId, m.menu_url AS menuUrl, m.father_menu_id AS fatherMenuId, m.order_index AS orderIndex FROM t_sett_ms_menu m
WHERE m.is_enable = 0 AND m.father_menu_id!=-1 AND m.menu_id IN (${fatherMenuIds}) ORDER BY m.father_menu_id, m.order_index

SELECT m.menu_id as menuId FROM t_sett_ms_menu m LEFT JOIN t_sett_ms_menu_permission b ON b.menu_id = m.menu_id WHERE b.permission_id IN (${menuIds})
AND m.menu_type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{menuType},'%')
AND m.menu_id IN ()
mapper.sql: SELECT model_key AS modelKey FROM t_admin_app_menu_item WHERE app_id IN (SELECT app_id FROM t_admin_app_group_rela WHERE group_id = (SELECT group_id FROM t_admin_group WHERE group_code = #{groupCode}) AND state = 0 UNION SELECT app_id AS appId FROM t_app_apply WHERE manager_code = #{managerCode} AND apply_state = 3) AND model_type = 0
mapper.select: SELECT user_name AS userName, is_enable AS isEnable, user_id AS userId, user_login_name AS userLoginName, isadmin, password AS password, operator_code AS operatorCode FROM t_ucenter_ms_role_user_rela WHERE (user_login_name = #{userLoginName} or mobile = #{userLoginName} or email = #{userLoginName}) AND password = #{password}

SELECT mpu.url FROM t_ucenter_ms_role_user_rela ur, t_ucenter_ms_role_permission rp, t_sett_ms_menu_permission_url_rela mpu WHERE ur.role_id = rp.role_id AND rp.permission_id = mpu.permission_id AND ur.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY mpu.url
select mpu.url from t_sett_ms_menu_permission_url_rela mpu

SELECT * FROM (SELECT id, name as text, parent_id AS parentId, 0 AS isUser, create_time FROM t_ucenter_ms_organization WHERE group_code = #{groupCode} ORDER BY create_time) temp UNION SELECT user_id, user_name AS text, organization_id AS parentId, 1 AS isUser, create_time FROM t_ucenter_ms_user WHERE group_code = #{groupCode}
